website_summaries.verdict: Unique, comfy approach to holding up almost any electronic device.
pros: Soft, yet effective stand for tablets and phones
Exterior is plush and lightweight, machine-washable microfiber
Cozy support for hours of use
Versatile and comfortable, use it on your lap, on the bed or couch, even in the car
Gently cradles your device in portrait or landscape position
cons: Need to be careful when using, because if stand is tilted, device can slide off it and possibly get damaged
